title: SS Rajamouli, Farmville game designer to team up for Baahubali mobile game | regional movies | Hindustan Times
text:
SS Rajamouli, Farmville game designer to team up for Baahubali mobile game regional movies Updated: Feb 09, 2017 14:30 IST Chennai SS Rajamouli’s Baahubali: The Conclusion will release on April 28, 2017. 
Mark Skaggs, the brain behind popular games such as Farmville and Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle-Earth, is partnering with filmmaker SS Rajamouli to create a Baahubali mobile game. 
“Mark Skaggs (from Moonfrog Labs), creator of Farmville and Lord of the Rings games (among others) discussing the creation of ‘Baahubali’ mobile game with S.S. Rajamouli. Exciting stuff coming your way. Stay tuned,” read a post on the official Facebook page of Baahubali. 
Baahubali, as a franchise, has gone beyond cinema. It’s being made into a novel, comics and even an animated series. Read more
